author: Tara Westover
title: Educated
description: A powerful memoir about resilience, education, and breaking free from a restrictive upbringing.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel exploring surveillance, totalitarianism, and individual freedom.

title: The Blue Umbrella

description: A powerful dystopian story of a woman navigating a repressive regime.

description: A dark and gripping fantasy inspired by Chinese history and mythology.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A tragic story of love, wealth, and betrayal set in the Jazz Age.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
description: A touching love story of two teenagers navigating life and loss with humor and grace.

description: A deeply personal memoir from the former First Lady of the United States.

description: A humorous and touching story of love, cultural differences, and family drama.

description: A thought-provoking collection of real-life stories showcasing compassion and human values.

author: Harper Lee
title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A moving story of racial injustice and moral growth in the Deep South.

description: An epic fantasy with dragons, intrigue, and strong female characters.

description: A delightful collection of short stories set in the fictional town of Malgudi.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A timeless romance that explores themes of love, class, and society.
